Balls - com.Leo.Game中的类
Mage Fireball The properties of the fireball: the speedX and speedY of the fireball - SpeedX=10,SpeedY=10, the length and width of the fireball - length=10,width=10, the position of the fireball, the direction of the fireball(diretion), whether the fireball is live(live), etc.
Balls(int, int, Direction) - 类 的构造器com.Leo.Game.Balls
Mage fireball construction method with three parameters Where the fireball appears
Balls(int, int, boolean, Direction, BattleField) - 类 的构造器com.Leo.Game.Balls
Mage fireball construction method with five parameters The position and definition of the fireball is the enemy fireball or our fireball.

BattleField - com.Leo.Game中的类
Battlefield interface class Graphical user interface, all the elements of the game can be used for the interface, the interface can accept the user's operation, with human-computer interaction.

Bullets - com.Leo.Game中的类
Shooter Bullets The properties of the bullets: the Bullets.speedX and Bullets.speedY of the bullets - SpeedX=10,SpeedY=10, the Bullets.length and Bullets.width of the bullets - length=10,width=10, the position of the bullets(Hero.Kdirection), the direction of the bullets(Bullets.diretion), whether the bullets is live(Bullets.live), etc.
Bullets(int, int, Direction) - 类 的构造器com.Leo.Game.Bullets
Shooter bullet construction method with three parameters Where the bullet appears
Bullets(int, int, boolean, Direction, BattleField) - 类 的构造器com.Leo.Game.Bullets
Shooter bullet construction method with five parameters The position and definition of the bullet is the enemy bullet or our bullet.
